director.name: 拉斯兰·范多特 Ruslan Fedotow

introduction: Rui lives alone on the outskirts of Lisbon, making a living from illegal fishing. He sells his crabs door to door by the kilo. Using dazzling chiaroscuro effects with an impressionist touch, Ruslan Fedotow gradually reveals the daily life of a man struggling with drug addiction, and his fight to stay in touch with his son who is being kept away from him.源自：https://www.visionsdureel.ch/en/film/2023/rui/
